description:
Yuuka is a close friend of Furan (who she likes to tease), and the Bookkeeper of the student council. She`s also the younger sister of Takeru`s homeroom teacher Amato Tomika.
Yuuka appears to be carefree most of the time. However, she is very cunning mostly encouraging activities of the Maken-ki that involve some kind of other work that needs to be done.
name: Amato Yuuka
